code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import TransactionsList from"./TransactionsList";import Search from"./Search";import AddTransactionForm from"./AddTransactionForm";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function AccountContainer(){const[transactions,setTransactions]=useState([]);const[query,setQuery]=useState("");useEffect(()=>{fetch('http://localhost:3000/transactions?q='+query).then(resp=>resp.json()).then(data=>setTransactions(data));},[query]);function handleSearch(e){setQuery(e.target.value);};const handleDelete=id=>{fetch("http://localhost:3000/transactions/".concat(id),{method:"DELETE"}).then(resp=>{if(resp.ok){const updatedTransactions=transactions.filter(transaction=>transaction.id!==id);setTransactions(updatedTransactions);}else{throw new Error("Failed to delete transaction");}}).catch(error=>console.error("Error deleting transaction: ",error));};const handleSort=sortBy=>{fetch("http://localhost:3000/transactions?sortBy=".concat(sortBy)).then(resp=>resp.json()).then(data=>{const sortedTransactions=data.sort((a,b)=>{const fieldValueA=a[sortBy].toLowerCase();const fieldValueB=b[sortBy].toLowerCase();if(fieldValueA<fieldValueB){return-1;}if(fieldValueA>fieldValueB){return 1;}return 0;});setTransactions(sortedTransactions);}).catch(error=>console.error("Error fetching sorted data: ",error));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Search,{handleSearch:handleSearch}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AddTransactionForm,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TransactionsList,{transactions:transactions,onDelete:handleDelete,onSort:handleSort})]});}export default AccountContainer;
